body.p:
Louisa Lawrence County Ky
Dec 189 1865 --
To His Excellency
Gov Bramlett,
Frankfort Ky

Your Petitioners respectfully ask and Petition that you remit a fine of $30 rendered before J, M Clayton Judge of Lawrence County Kentucky on the day of December 1865, against N. D Redhead Said Redhead is a druggist duly licensed in good faith & was imposed upon by the certificates for Liquors given to his store by one Murry who claimed to be a Physician -- when really he was not a qualified Physician & th upon his said Orders the Liquor was sold for which he was arrested Readhead admitted the selling tas charged & confessed a fine of $30 which we pray be remitted He has always complied with the requisites of the Law we are sure so far as he Knew then & is a man of unexceptionable moral character & good conduct We believe that it will be true justice to remit this fine

Your fellow citizens
Jno M Clayton county Judge
John H. Allison S L C
R. H Prichard
